name: Tressie V. PALM, Appellant, v. WORKMEN'S COMPENSATION APPEAL BOARD (CLUETT, PEABODY & CO., INC.)
name_abbreviation: Palm v. Workmen's Compensation Appeal Board

judges: Before NIX, C.J., and LARSEN, FLAHERTY, McDER-MOTT, HUTCHINSON and PAPADAKOS, JJ.
ZAPPALA, J., did not participate in the consideration or decision of this case.
parties: Tressie V. PALM, Appellant, v. WORKMEN’S COMPENSATION APPEAL BOARD (CLUETT, PEABODY & CO., INC.).

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
Order affirmed.
ZAPPALA, J., did not participate in the consideration or decision of this case.
LARSEN, J., dissents.
JUDGMENT
ON CONSIDERATION WHEREOF, it is now hereby ordered and adjudged by this Court that the Order of the Commonwealth Court is affirmed.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

attorneys: David A. Goldman, Lewistown, for appellant.
Daniel K. Deardorff, William F. Martson, Carlisle, for appellee.
casebody.head_matter:
492 A.2d 1118
Tressie V. PALM, Appellant, v. WORKMEN’S COMPENSATION APPEAL BOARD (CLUETT, PEABODY & CO., INC.).
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Argued May 15, 1985.
Decided May 28, 1985.
David A. Goldman, Lewistown, for appellant.
Daniel K. Deardorff, William F. Martson, Carlisle, for appellee.
Before NIX, C.J., and LARSEN, FLAHERTY, McDER-MOTT, HUTCHINSON and PAPADAKOS, JJ.
